title: Disconnected
body: I just lost LP due to being dropped by your server. The game is now showing up as a remake. Please give me back my LP! I didn't lose the game cause it never actually happened. I don't want to lose my hard earned LP to server errors.

replies.body: I don't see that there were any server issues during this game with Lux, and we don't have a reason to drop a player like this.  It sounds like your network failed to establish a connection, so communication with the game never happened.  Let me know if you're still having this issue, so we can troubleshoot it before more penalties incur!
